== What is Ubuntu Kylin ? ==

The objective of the Ubuntu Kylin project is to create a variant of Ubuntu that is more suitable for previous Windows users all over the world. We are committed to provide you with a simpler and more enjoyable experience out-of-the-box. For instance, by providing UKUI Desktop Environment which provide a ‘familiar Windows-style layout’ to windows. Ubuntu Kylin has been a formal member of the Ubuntu family, since Ubuntu Kylin 13.04. Now, we are working on 18.10.

== What's new in Ubuntu Kylin 18.10 ==

Beijing 27th September 2018: Ubuntu Kylin Team releases Ubuntu Kylin 18.10 beta (version code: Cosmic Cuttlefish) officially, updating system kernel, desktop environment and many other bug-fixes. In the mean time, Ubuntu 18.10/ Lubuntu 18.10 /Ubuntu Mate 18.10 and so on are releasing today.

<nowiki>[[File:ukui-menu.png|| width=400]]</nowiki>

==== Linux Kernel ====

Linux Kernel 4.18

==== Desktop Environment ====
* A new theme which will give you a new fresh look is on the way. (Waiting for Sponsorship, LP: #1794709)
* Added a feedback tools.

<nowiki>[[File:shortcut.png|| width=400]]</nowiki>
* More powerful settings center.
<nowiki>[[File:ukui-control-center.png|| width=400]]</nowiki>

<nowiki>[[File:weather.png|| width=250]]</nowiki>

== Download ==

The Release ISO can be downloaded from <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/ubuntukylin/releases/cosmic/beta/ | here]]</nowiki>.

== Known Issues ==

* kylin-display-switch will crash under certain circumstances.
* The indicator sometimes aborts and disappears. (LP: #1764951) 
* The logo in login page are still 18.04, and the new greeter is waiting for sponsorship. (LP: #1792261)

Since this version is an beta pre-release, there are still some issues, and we will fix this soon before final release.
